snippet: Exclusive to Fashion Week: T tracks one statement worn two ways. The looks: jacquard coats, haute hoods, hourglass jackets, yellow miniskirts, red outerwear, pretty peplums, veils and reading accessories.
abstract: Exclusive to Fashion Week: T tracks one statement worn two ways. The looks: jacquard coats, haute hoods, hourglass jackets, yellow miniskirts, red outerwear, pretty peplums, veils and reading accessories.

headline.main: Paris Street Style | Serene vs. Extreme
